# influxdb-v2_bucket (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  org_id = "example_org_id"
}

resource "influxdb-v2_bucket" "example_bucket" {
  name        = "example_bucket_name"
  description = "Example bucket description"
  org_id      = local.org_id
  retention_rules {
    every_seconds = 0
  }
}
```

- `org_id` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)
- `rp` (String)
